p: Plants have an outer surface layer of wax, which is usually a complex mixture of aliphatic lipid compounds, such as straight and branched chain alkanes, alkenes, long-chain fatty acids and esters, long-chain fatty alcohols, long-chain fatty aldehydes, and ketones. Nonacosane ( 139) (in L. inebrians, L. proskorjacovii, L. pubescens) [ 12, 51, 60, 61], hentriacontane ( 140), tritriacontane ( 141) (in L. inebrians) [ 51], phytol ( 142), 12-hentriacontanol ( 143), and octacosanol ( 144) (in L. ilicifolius) [ 5], dacosyl ester ( 145) (in L. lanatonodus) [ 27] are present in Lagochilus species ( Table 3, Figure S9).
